frontmatter.title: Appreciate best of others
frontmatter.description: Bring good energy and help others with their struggles. Find ways to appreciate the good from others. Work to be better for others.

frontmatter.title: Positive commonalities
frontmatter.description: Seemingly disparate groups often shared some common interests. Identify positive commonalities across traditional demographic groups.

frontmatter.title: Veering off track
frontmatter.description: Taking the wrong perspective makes it almost impossible to see the change in real time. With the proper view, it's easy to prevent veering off track.

frontmatter.title: Silence is a reply
frontmatter.description: Silence is a reply, and it leaves much to infer.

frontmatter.title: Listen and observe more in conversation
frontmatter.description: Spend more time observing and listening in conversation. Don't rush to speak or give opinions. It's needed less than you think.

frontmatter.title: Speak more about enduring themes
frontmatter.description: Spend more time considering enduring themes rather than speaking about specific current events.

frontmatter.title: Pause and consider role before responding
frontmatter.description: Pause and consider other perspectives. Ask questions. Determine role and the right way to respond. Better to get it right than rush and assume.

frontmatter.title: Assume good intentions first
frontmatter.description: Like animals and computers, people can be provoked or poorly programmed. That's not generally the default state.

frontmatter.title: Support others by listening and asking guiding questions
frontmatter.description: Take more time to listen to others. They often don't want feedback or advice. They want to share.
